alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 4:53AM CDT until April 30 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... East central Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Blocker to Krebs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Wilburton... Hartshorne... Krebs... Alderson... Higgins... Damon... Robbers Cave State Park... Haileyville... Gowen... Panola... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
